moves.3... g6: Looks like he is gonna fianchetto his Bishops.
moves.4. Bc4: I got my sights on the f7 square.
moves.7... Bg7: Fianchettoes his Bishop and prepares to Castle.
moves.8... Bc6 9. Bd5 Bxd5 10. Nxd5 dxe5 11. d: Now I can surprise attack the Queen.
moves.11... Nxf4 12. Nexf4 Bxe5 13. g3 Bxb2 14: I don't know if this move was a blunder or what.
moves.16. Qxe5 gxf4: Now follows a series of forced moves.
moves.19... Qxe7 20. Qxe7: From here, it would be too easy for White to win, so Black resigns.

gameName: One of my better White Openings
